author: cmpilato
msg: Finish the 'svn revert' portion of the --changelist feature revamp.
(revert): Add 'changelists' parameter, now passed off to svn_wc_revert3().
(svn_client_revert2): Add 'changelists' parameter.  Update call to revert().
(svn_cl__revert): Update call to svn_client_revert2(), and lose
changelist crawl.  While here, recommend "--depth infinity"
instead of "--recursive" in certain failure cases.
Update status of the feature revamp.

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix a bug in the depth support for 'svn revert': depth-files was
trying to crawl into unlocked directories.
(revert_internal): Don't recurse into subdirectories when at depth files.

author: cmpilato
msg: Add 'changelist' support to the svn_wc_revert3() API.  I'll actually
teach the client layer to use it in a follow-up commit.
(revert_entry): New function with reversion logic abstracted from
'changelist_hash' parameter, and uses it to filter revert
(svn_wc_revert3): Now accepts a 'changelists' parameter, and is but
(revert): Update call to svn_wc_revert3().  We're not passing

author: cmpilato
msg: Lose TODO item for 'svn rm', which doesn't even have --changelist
